name: Mexican Motor Mafia
storyline: Set in a post-apocalyptic, desert-like world inspired by the American Southwest and Mexico, the player takes on the role of a vigilante seeking justice. Along the way, the player encounters various bounty hunters, mercenaries, and rival gangs, each with their motives and challenges. Ultimately, the player must confront the Red Texas Four in an explosive showdown, determining the fate of their family and their legacy in the lawless wasteland.
summary: Mexican Motor Mafia is a top-down action game. The aim of the game is that your car has to destroy enemy vehicles to work your way up to take revenge. You can buy various items after you enter any town.
